node.title: Making the Great Commission the Center of Our Medical Practice: Practical examples of ministry in a medical office
node.description: OBJECTIVES 1. Understand Why The Great Commission Is Central to the Medical Missionary Work. 2. Understand the importance of sacrificial love in medical ministry and catch the vision by giving practical examples of whole person care. 3. Discuss the importance of partnering with the church for medical ministry and how to achieve this. 4. Demonstrate how to incorporate practical applications of Design Thinking into medical ministry.
